ygData.subject: Biggest frustration
ygData.msgSnippet: My biggest frustration is the AI, obviously. My team members attack anything, regardless of level, virtually ignore yell and protect orders, and scatter

My biggest frustration is the AI, obviously. My team
members attack anything, regardless of level,
virtually ignore yell and protect orders, and scatter
themselves everywhere. It's extraordinarily hard to
make them act as a unit, unless I play at slow speeds
and alternate between each character, dragging each
one out of danger in turn. At this level of AI, it's
easiest to play a team of one.
   -Tevildo, Prince of Cats.
